queries.entryTimeTotal: select cast(floor(cast(ENTRY_TIME as float)*24*60/30)*30/60/24 as smalldatetime) as date,count(*) as total from IRD_QUE_INSPECTION_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) where CONVERT(varchar(100), ENTRY_TIME , 14) Between '00:00:00:000' and '24:00:00:000' and DATEDIFF( DAY, ENTRY_TIME, :createDate) = 0 and CENTER_CODE = :centerCode and DATEDIFF( DAY, CREATE_DATE, :createDate) = 0 group by cast(floor(cast(ENTRY_TIME as float)*24*60/30)*30/60/24 as smalldatetime)
queries.completeTimeTotal: select cast(floor(cast(COMPLETE_TIME as float)*24*60/30)*30/60/24 as smalldatetime) as date,count(*) as total from IRD_QUE_INSPECTION_PROCESS WITH(NOLOCK) where CONVERT(varchar(100), COMPLETE_TIME , 14) Between '00:00:00:000' and '24:00:00:000' and DATEDIFF( DAY, COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate) =0 and CENTER_CODE = :centerCode and DATEDIFF( DAY, CREATE_DATE, :createDate) = 0 group by cast(floor(cast(COMPLETE_TIME as float)*24*60/30)*30/60/24 as smalldatetime)
queries.getTableSumTotal:
SELECT 'TOTAL' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID ORDER BY VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP DESC, VIT.INSP_TASK_ID DESC ) AS ROW FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T1 WHERE ROW = 1 ) AS T2
UNION ALL
SELECT 'NEW_CAR' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID ORDER BY VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP DESC, VIT.INSP_TASK_ID DESC ) AS ROW FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND (VIT.INSP_METHOD = '04' OR VIT.INSP_METHOD = '05') AND (VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE = '03') AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T1 WHERE ROW = 1 ) AS T2
UNION ALL
SELECT 'SPECIAL' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID ORDER BY VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP DESC, VIT.INSP_TASK_ID DESC ) AS ROW FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND (VIT.INSP_METHOD = '04' OR VIT.INSP_METHOD = '05') AND (VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE = '01') AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T1 WHERE ROW = 1 ) AS T2
UNION ALL
SELECT 'OUT' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID ORDER BY VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP DESC, VIT.INSP_TASK_ID DESC ) AS ROW FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND VIT.INSP_METHOD = '06' AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T1 WHERE ROW = 1 ) AS T2
UNION ALL
SELECT 'REGULAR' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND (VIT.INSP_METHOD = '04' OR VIT.INSP_METHOD = '05') AND (VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE = '02') AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T2
UNION ALL
SELECT 'REGULAR_VEH' AS TYPE, COUNT(1) AS TOTAL, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS PASS, ISNULL(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END), 0) AS NO_PASS, ISNULL((CAST(SUM(CASE INSPECTION_RESULT WHEN '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(1)), 0) AS PASS_RATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT VIT.INSP_TASK_ID, VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP, VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE, VIT.INSP_METHOD, VIR.INSPECTION_RESULT, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY VIT.VEH_ID ORDER BY VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID DESC, VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP DESC, VIT.INSP_TASK_ID DESC ) AS ROW FROM IRD_INP_TASK VIT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN IRD_INP_RESULT VIR WITH (NOLOCK) ON VIR.INSP_MASTER_ID = VIT.INSP_MASTER_ID AND VIR.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP = VIT.NO_OF_TIMES_INSP AND (VIT.INSP_METHOD = '04' OR VIT.INSP_METHOD = '05') AND (VIT.CVIC_INSP_TYPE = '02') AND VIT.STATUS = 'A' AND VIT.BUSINESS_STATUS = '07' AND VIT.CENTER_CODE = :centerCode AND DATEDIFF( DAY, VIT.COMPLETE_TIME, :createDate ) = 0 ) AS T1 WHERE ROW = 1 ) AS T2
queries.getCitizenAvgData: select ISNULL(avg(datediff(mi,ENTRY_TIME,ENROLL_TIME)), 0) as citizenAvgMin,count(*) as citizenAvgMinCount from IRD_QUE_INSPECTION_PROCESS vqip WITH(NOLOCK) where VSS_LOGIN_TIME is not null and ENROLL_TIME is not null and ENROLL_TIME < COMPLETE_TIME and CENTER_CODE =:centerCode and DATEDIFF(day,CREATE_DATE , :createDate) = 0
queries.getCarAvgData: select ISNULL(avg(datediff(mi,ENROLL_TIME,COMPLETE_TIME)), 0) as carAvgMin,count(*) as carAvgMinCount from IRD_QUE_INSPECTION_PROCESS vqip WITH(NOLOCK) where COMPLETE_TIME is not null and ENROLL_TIME is not null and ENROLL_TIME < COMPLETE_TIME and CENTER_CODE =:centerCode and DATEDIFF(day,CREATE_DATE , :createDate) = 0
